description:
What starts as a severe stomachache on the part of Nejiru and Heybot quickly escalates, as the sky suddenly darkens and a man called Lord Nejikill descends. Using dastardly tactics, Nejikill steals all the Zodiac screws, as well as Heybot`s own screw soul and Bungle-Bungle Screw! When things get this bad, there`s only one thing that can save our heroes... a new character debut!
Source: crunchyroll
